var scroll = function(increment) { $items.scrollTop($items.scrollTop() + increment); };

var $scrolldown = $('<a href="#" class="scrolldown"></a>').addClass('disabled').appendTo($sectionBody);
(function() {
var increment = 20;
var interval = 40;
var scrollup = function() { scroll(-increment); };
var scrollupIntervalID;
$scrollup.on({
'mousedown': function(event) { scrollupIntervalID = setInterval(scrollup, interval); }
, 'mouseup mouseleave': function(event) { clearInterval(scrollupIntervalID); }
, 'click': function(event) { event.preventDefault(); }
});
var scrolldown = function() { scroll(increment); };
var scrolldownIntervalID;
$scrolldown.on({
'mousedown': function(event) { scrolldownIntervalID = setInterval(scrolldown, interval); }
, 'mouseup mouseleave': function(event) { clearInterval(scrolldownIntervalID); }
, 'click': function(event) { event.preventDefault(); }
});
})();
$items.on('mousewheel', function(event, delta) {
var increment = 40;
if (delta > 0 && !$scrollup.hasClass('disabled')) {
event.preventDefault();
scroll(-increment);
} else if (delta < 0 && !$scrolldown.hasClass('disabled')) {
event.preventDefault();
scroll(increment);
}
});
setInterval(function() {
var elem = $items.get(0);
if (elem.scrollTop == 0) {
$scrollup.addClass('disabled');
} else { 
$scrollup.removeClass('disabled');
}
if (elem.offsetHeight + elem.scrollTop >= elem.scrollHeight) {
$scrolldown.addClass('disabled');
} else {
$scrolldown.removeClass('disabled');
}
}, 50);
}
});
